import React from "react"; function QuoteForm({postForm, setPostForm}){ //change the value of the postForm state and the input text box function inputTextHandler(e){ setPostForm((prevState) => ({...prevState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } //post info to database function postInfo(e){ e.preventDefault(); console.log(postForm); Axios.post('http://localhost:3001/createquote', { userID: 1, dot_number: postForm.dotNum, nbr_of_pwr_units: postForm.pwrNum, val_of_pwr_units: postForm.pwrVal, premium_amount: postForm.premAmnt, premium_tax: postForm.premTax, premium_total: postForm.premTot, street: postForm.street, city: postForm.city, state: postForm.state, zipcode: postForm.zip, driver1_name: postForm.name1, driver1_age: postForm.age1, driver2_name: postForm.name2, driver2_age: postForm.age2, driver3_name: postForm.name3, driver3_age: postForm.age3, driver4_name: postForm.name4, driver4_age: postForm.age4, driver5_name: postForm.name5, driver5_age: postForm.age5 }).then(() => { console.log("Success!"); }); } return(

Truck Info

Dot Number

Premium Amount

# of Power Units

Premium Tax

Value of Power Units

Premium Total

Address

Street

City

State

Zip Code

Driver Info

Name

Age

Name

Age

Name

Age

Name

Age

Name

Age

); } export default QuoteForm;
